events.name: OnChallengeQuery
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnChallengeQuery
events.description: Called when the challenge options get populated.

events.name: OnTickEvenPaused
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnTickEvenPaused
events.description: Same as OnTick, but triggered when the game is paused as well.

events.name: OnCharacterCollide
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnCharacterCollide
events.description: Called when [[IsoGameCharacter]] collides with another [[IsoGameCharacter]]

events.name: OnAIStateExit
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnAIStateExit
events.description: Triggered when an AI state is exited.

parameters.name: character
parameters.description: The character the state was executed on.

events.name: OnConnectFailed
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnConnectFailed
events.description: Triggered when connection to server has failed.

events.name: OnPreMapLoad
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnPreMapLoad
events.description: Triggered before a map is loaded.

events.name: OnEquipSecondary
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnEquipSecondary
events.description: Triggered when a character equips an item in its secondary slot.

parameters.name: character
parameters.description: The character which equipped the item.

events.name: OnNewGame
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnNewGame
events.description: Triggered after a world is initialized.

parameters.name: square
parameters.description: The square where the player is located.

events.name: OnAddBuilding
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnAddBuilding
events.description: OBSOLETE

events.name: OnLoad
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnLoad
events.description: Called when game is loading.

events.name: OnTick
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnTick
events.description: Called every tick, try to not use this one, use EveryTenMinutes instead because it can create a lot of frame loss/garbage collection.

events.name: OnInitWorld
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnInitWorld
events.description: Triggered during the process of initializing the world.

events.name: OnPlayerUpdate
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnPlayerUpdate
events.description: Called when [[IsoPlayer]] updates.

events.name: OnDisconnect
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnDisconnect
events.description: Triggered when player disconnects from server.

events.name: OnEnterVehicle
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnEnterVehicle
events.description: Called when [[IsoPlayer]] successfully enters a vehicle.

events.name: OnLoadSoundBanks
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnLoadSoundBanks
events.description: Triggered when sound banks are loaded for the game.

events.name: OnPlayerMove
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnPlayerMove
events.description: Triggered while the player is moving.

events.name: OnRightMouseDown
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnRightMouseDown
events.description: Triggered when right mouse button is down.

events.name: OnPreFillInventoryObjectContextMenu
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnPreFillInventoryObjectContextMenu
events.description: Called before context menus get filled with options.

events.name: OnFillWorldObjectContextMenu
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnFillWorldObjectContextMenu
events.description: Called when world object context menus are filed.

parameters.name: player
parameters.description: The player who will see the menu.

parameters.name: boolean
parameters.description: True if called for the purpose of testing for nearby objects.

events.name: OnPostMapLoad
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnPostMapLoad
events.description: Triggered after a cell is loaded.

events.name: OnCreateSurvivor
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnCreateSurvivor
events.description: Triggered when a survivor is created.

events.name: OnPostUIDraw
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnPostUIDraw
events.description: Called by UI Manager in its render function after the UI has been drawn.

events.name: OnObjectLeftMouseButtonDown
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnObjectLeftMouseButtonDown
events.description: Triggered when left mouse button clicked on [[IsoObject]]

events.name: OnCreatePlayer
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnCreatePlayer
events.description: Triggered when a player is created.

events.name: OnMainMenuEnter
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnMainMenuEnter
events.description: Called when player sees the main menu. This will occur when they launch the game or if they quit a running game.

events.name: OnObjectRightMouseButtonDown
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnObjectRightMouseButtonDown
events.description: Triggered when right mouse button clicked on [[IsoObject]]

events.name: OnScoreboardUpdate
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnScoreboardUpdate
events.description: Called when multiplayer scoreboard is updated.

events.name: OnCharacterCreateStats
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnCharacterCreateStats
events.description: Triggered when a characters stats are created.

events.name: OnAIStateExecute
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnAIStateExecute
events.description: Triggered when an AI state executes.

parameters.name: character
parameters.description: The character the state executed on.

events.name: OnRefreshInventoryWindowContainers
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnRefreshInventoryWindowContainers
events.description: Triggered during the process of refreshing inventory containers.

parameters.name: string
parameters.description: A string representing the state of the refresh process; can be any of "begin", "beforeFloor", "buttonsAdded", and "end".

events.name: OnKeyPressed
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnKeyPressed
events.description: Called when key is pressed.

parameters.name: integer
parameters.description: denoted key. (See Keyboard Class in java docs for more info.)

events.name: OnMakeItem
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnMakeItem
events.description: OBSOLETE

events.name: OnClothingUpdated
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnClothingUpdated
events.description: Triggered when a character's clothing items are updated.

parameters.name: character
parameters.description: The character whose clothing was updated.

events.name: OnCreateLivingCharacter
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnCreateLivingCharacter
events.description: Called when IsoPlayer or IsoSurvivor is being created.

events.name: OnLoginState
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnLoginState
events.description: Used when entering login state (?)

events.name: OnPostFloorLayerDraw
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnPostFloorLayerDraw
events.description: Triggered after a floor layer is rendered.

parameters.name: integer
parameters.description: The Z-index of the layer which was rendered.

events.name: OnNPCSurvivorUpdate
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnNPCSurvivorUpdate
events.description: Called when [[IsoSurvivor]] updates.

events.name: OnGameStart
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnGameStart
events.description: Called when a new game is started, or loading of a save is finished.

events.name: OnObjectLeftMouseButtonUp
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnObjectLeftMouseButtonUp
events.description: Triggered when left mouse button is released on [[IsoObject]]

events.name: OnNewSurvivorGroup
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnNewSurvivorGroup
events.description: OBSOLETE/UNUSED

events.name: OnRightMouseUp
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnRightMouseUp
events.description: Triggered when mouse button is released.

events.name: OnWeaponSwingHitPoint
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnWeaponSwingHitPoint
events.description: Triggered when a [[HandWeapon]] has hit the apex of its swing.

events.name: LevelPerk
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/LevelPerk
events.description: Triggered when a perk is leveled up.

parameters.name: character
parameters.description: The character whose perk is being leveled up.

events.name: EveryHours
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/EveryHours
events.description: Called every in game hour on the hour.

events.name: OnCharacterMeet
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnCharacterMeet
events.description: Triggered when a survivor meets another character.

parameters.name: integer
parameters.description: The number of times before this the two characters have met; if it is 0, this is the first time.

events.name: OnCustomUIKey
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnCustomUIKey
events.description: Unknown.

parameters.name: integer
parameters.description: denoted key. (See Keyboard Class in java docs for more info.)

events.name: OnWeaponHitTree
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnWeaponHitTree
events.description: Triggered when an [[IsoGameCharacter]] uses a [[HandWeapon]] to hit an [[IsoTree]].

events.name: OnPreUIDraw
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnPreUIDraw
events.description: Called by UI Manager in its render function before the UI gets drawn.

events.name: OnLoadMapZones
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnLoadMapZones
events.description: Called when IsoWorld initialises and is registering the zones for the map.

events.name: OnSpawnRegionsLoaded
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnSpawnRegionsLoaded
events.description: Triggered after spawn regions are loaded.
events.additional_info: This event is triggered on the server.

events.name: EveryDays
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/EveryDays
events.description: Called every in game day at midnight.

events.name: OnObjectCollide
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnObjectCollide
events.description: Called when [[IsoGameCharacter]] collides with another [[IsoObject]]

events.name: OnPreGameStart
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnPreGameStart
events.description: Event is now obsolete.

events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnFETick
events.description: Same as OnTick, except is only called while on the main menu.

events.name: OnLoginStateSuccess
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnLoginStateSuccess
events.description: When LoginState succeeds.

events.name: OnGameBoot
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnGameBoot
events.description: Lua event is called when the game/server is started or when mods are reloaded while the game is started.

events.name: OnMouseUp
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnMouseUp
events.description: Triggered when mouse button is released.

events.name: OnAIStateChange
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnAIStateChange
events.description: Triggered before an AI state changes.

parameters.name: character
parameters.description: The character that owns the state machine.

events.description: OBSOLETE

events.name: OnMouseMove
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnMouseMove
events.description: Triggered when mouse is moved.

events.name: OnPlayerCancelTimedAction
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnPlayerCancelTimedAction
events.description: Triggered when a player cancels a timed action.

events.name: OnZombieDead
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnZombieDead
events.description: Called after a player kills [[IsoZombie]].

events.name: OnMouseDown
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnMouseDown
events.description: Triggered when mouse button is down.

events.name: OnWeaponSwing
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnWeaponSwing
events.description: Triggered when a [[IsoGameCharacter]] swings [[HandWeapon]]

events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnWeaponHitCharacter
events.description: Triggered when a [[IsoGameCharacter]] has been hit by a [[HandWeapon]]

events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnConnected
events.description: Called when player successfully connects to server.

events.name: OnZombieUpdate
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnZombieUpdate
events.description: Called when [[IsoZombie]] updates.

events.name: OnCreateUI
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnCreateUI
events.description: Triggered after UI initialization.

events.name: OnSave
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnSave
events.description: Triggered during the game's saving process.
events.additional_info: The event is triggered after saving ''map_ver.bin'' and ''map_sand.bin'', and just before saving ''map.bin''.

events.name: OnPreFillWorldObjectContextMenu
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnPreFillWorldObjectContextMenu
events.description: Called before context menu for world objects is filled.

parameters.name: player
parameters.description: The player who will see the menu.

parameters.name: boolean
parameters.description: True if called for the purpose of testing for nearby objects.

events.name: OnPlayerSetSafehouse
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnPlayerSetSafehouse
events.description: Triggered when survivor group has their safehouse set.

parameters.name: survivorGroup
parameters.description: The survivor group safehouse is being set for.

parameters.name: buildingDef
parameters.description: The building definition of the safehouse being set.

events.name: OnObjectRightMouseButtonUp
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnObjectRightMouseButtonUp
events.description: Triggered when right mouse button is released on [[IsoObject]]

events.name: OnFillInventoryObjectContextMenu
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnFillInventoryObjectContextMenu
events.description: Use the event (as you would 'OnTick' etc) to add items to context menu without mod conflicts.

events.name: OnRenderUpdate
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnRenderUpdate
events.description: Used to be called every Display.update() but is now obsolete.

events.name: OnKeyKeepPressed
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnKeyKeepPressed
events.description: Called when key is held down.

parameters.name: integer
parameters.description: denoted key. (See Keyboard Class in java docs for more info.)

events.name: OnTriggerNPCEvent
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnTriggerNPCEvents
events.description: Called when Trigger is hit (?)

events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnConnectionStateChanged
events.description: Called at the different stages that a players connection state changes to the server when initially connecting.

events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnEquipPrimary
events.description: Triggered when a character equips an item in its primary slot.

parameters.name: character
parameters.description: The character which equipped the item.

events.title: Modding:Lua Events/EveryTenMinutes
events.description: Called every ten in game minutes.

events.name: OnPlayerDeath
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnPlayerDeath
events.description: Triggered when a player dies.

events.name: OnJoypadActivate
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnJoypadActivate

parameters.name: integer
parameters.description: The ID of the activated controller.

events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnAIStateEnter
events.description: Triggered when an AI state is entered.

parameters.name: character
parameters.description: The character the state will execute on.

events.name: AddXP
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/AddXP
events.description: Triggered when earning XP?

events.name: OnKeyStartPressed
events.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnKeyStartPressed
events.description: Called when key is initially pressed.

parameters.name: integer
